title: What is the benefit of 5G in OnePlus Nord smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is none at present, given most places don’t even have full bandwidth 4G LTE access, especially rural areas or during intercity travel along highways. The only benefit is that when you go out to sell it (or trade in) 2–3 years later, it will retain more value. A 4G phone may not retain the same value.

literally no benefit you are just paying extra Rs.5,000/- to the company. It doesn't make any sense to buy any 5G compatible phone right now because we don't know the exact time when we get the complete 5G coverage. If you found this information helpful please Upvote and join my tech space on Quora named Android Bureau. Thanks.
